snippet: Almost two years after losing his firstborn to an illness, pitcher Pat Neshek, 33, won a roster spot with St. Louis, became a father again and, finally, a first-time All-Star.
abstract: St Louis Cardinals relief pitcher Pat Neshek has, nearly two years after losing his firstborn son to unexplained illness, won roster spot with St Louis and become father again, as well as first time All-Star.
lead_paragraph: Almost two years after losing his firstborn to an illness, pitcher Pat Neshek, 33, won a roster spot with St. Louis, became a father again and, finally, a first-time All-Star.

headline.seo: Cardinals Marvel at Pat Neshek’s Comeback
headline.main: Cardinal Reliever’s Tumultuous Road Leads to an All-Star Ending
headline.print_headline: Cardinal Reliever’s Tumultuous Road Leads to an All-Star Ending
